name: Prior To Arrests
description:
A game made for RevScarecrow's Rev Jam 2, for the themes: "Don't Get Arrested" and "Someday you must destroy the future". I took a fairly abstract view on the second theme, and created a top down stealth game with time mechanics

No music, only a few bleeps and bloops here and there, and unquestionably placeholder spritework. I spent most of my time on the logic and gameplay.

Controls:
WASD - Directional movement
E - Use
Space - Rewind (Once power is granted)
Esc - Return to main menu
